article:
'Dream incubation' is a practiced technique of learning to "plant a seed" in the
mind, in order for a specific dream topic to occur, either for recreation or to
attempt to solve a problem. For example, a person might go to bed repeating to
themselves that they will dream about a presentation they have coming up, or a
vacation they recently took. While somewhat similar to lucid dreaming, dream
incubation is simply focusing attention on a specific issue when going to sleep.
Several studies have shown this method to be successful over a period of time.
